DataElement.preferredName: Neuro-QOL Item Bank v2.0 Adult Mental Health Cognitive Function NQCOG66r1 Past 7 Days How Often Had Difficulty Doing More than One Task Concurrently Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how often during the past 7 days they had difficulty doing more than one thing at a time, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Neuro-QoL Adult Self-Reported Mental Health Domain Neuro QoL Cognitive Function Subdomain Past Week How Often Had Difficulty Doing More than One Task Concurrently Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain of the Quality of Life in Neurological Disorders that assesses the status of an adult individual's mental health._The collection of Neuro-QoL item scales that assess perceived difficulties in cognitive abilities related to both executive function and general concerns.:_The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about how often an individual has or had difficulty doing more than one thing at a time._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A set of self-reported and proxy-reported measures of physical, mental, and social health for adults and children living with a neurological condition._An ordered reference standard used with the Neuro-QoL item bank that describes a reverse range of subjective scores for representing how often an individual experiences something from 5: Never, to 1: Very often.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: On most occasions, or in most situations.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: I had difficulty doing more than one thing at a time

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
